Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

About me...

I am Mechanical Engineer working as Technical Operations Supervisor in Edenor S.A. in charge of 20 contractorsâ€™ teams in operative tasks and energy recovery. Also, Aeronautical Technician with four years of experience in a Power Plant in Maintenance.I consider myself a proactive, enthusiastic, positive, curious, and charismatic person and I contribute to the field by encouraging teamwork. I consider having good communication skills that allow me to generate good interactions and relationships with both individuals and groups, a skill that currently helps me in negotiations with contractors and personnel management. I am a perfectionist, so I try to improve every day.

My goals are...

Traveling around de world, working and learning about new cultures and ways to work. I seek to be part of a company, which I can contribute by providing my experience and knowledge and thus developing in the professional and personal field. I am willing to move to other countries if the position to fill requires it.
